00024 {
00025   static char *desktop = NULL;
00026 
00027   switch(mode) {
00028     case 0:               /* Save desktop                        */
00029       if (!desktop) {     /* Allocate memory if not already done */
00030         desktop = (unsigned char *) malloc(_cursvar.cols*_cursvar.lines*2);
00031         if (desktop == NULL) {
00032           fprintf(stderr,"ERROR: out of memory for saving desktop");
00033           exit(0);
00034         }
00035       }
00036       v_gettext(0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,desktop);
00037       return(FALSE);
00038       break;
00039 
00040     case 1:                 /* Restore desktop if already saved */
00041       if (desktop) {
00042         v_puttext(0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,desktop);
00043         return(TRUE);
00044       }
00045       return(FALSE);
00046       break;
00047   }
00048 
00049   return(FALSE);
